description: Each accuses the other of targeting civilians in renewed fighting over the Nagorno-Karabakh region.
title: Nagorno-Karabakh: Civilians hit amid Armenia Azerbaijan conflict
title_page: Nagorno-Karabakh: Civilians hit amid Armenia Azerbaijan conflict - BBC News
maintext: On Thursday, Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan said his country had suffered "numerous casualties" on the battlefield, but added that despite "losses of manpower and equipment", Armenian forces were still in general control and had inflicted "numerous losses of manpower and equipment on the enemy".
